fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- As an Achromatic color, White can Color a player to turn them into a Color, as long as a Primary Color is also selecting to Color the same player.
- White symbolizes purity, innocence, and cleanliness. White can purify a player, making them appear innocent to investigatives until one checks the target, and while the effect is active, Town killers with a Powerful attack or lower are unable to bring themself to kill this innocent being.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- White is a mixture of all colors. It can only be created by a Color fading away during the day, exposing them to all the various colors, turning them White. It cannot spawn in the starting rolelist.
- Each White may only have their effect active on one player at a time. They may choose to move it at any time.
- The effects of preventing Town killers from killing a target only activates once per game, per White.
- As White only exists out of dead players, it may act while dead.
Color Combinations:
- White and Red (3575) makes Pink (3582).
- White and Yellow (3576) makes Pastel Yellow (3584).
- White and Blue (3577) makes Baby Blue (3586).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Paint the Town into a rainbow!
